meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by aniseikonia.
meanings.sent1: The aniseikonic glasses helped correct his vision.
meanings.sent2: Her aniseikonic condition made it challenging to perceive depth accurately.
meanings.sent3: The aniseikonic cat tried to catch a mouse but kept missing by a whisker.
meanings.sent4: The aniseikonic world seemed like a distorted painting to him.
meanings.sent5: The aniseikonic effect of the mirror made her reflection appear taller than in reality.

meanings.sent1: The painting had an aniseikonic quality that made it unique.
meanings.sent2: The aniseikonic images in the exhibit fascinated the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The aniseikonic clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her aniseikonic dreams were filled with surreal landscapes.
meanings.sent5: The aniseikonic patterns on the fabric created an optical illusion.
